chara.textHome:
I came chasing after Mami, and now here
I am striking out in Kamihama at last...
Sure is a weird city!

I ran into a bunch of Witches and
Familiars back there, and then...
Uh, what's it called? An Uwasa?

That thing's way wilder than anything
I could've imagined!

Though it's nothing Mami
can't keep up with...

I'm not the same Sayaka I used to be.
Now I'm a whole new person...
One I never could've become on my own!

Now it's time to put the new me to
the test and cut loose!
I'm on top of the world!

Right now I'm soaring,
flying above the clouds!

Y'know, I think I'm seeing the world
in a new light now.
Wow, I think I got a bit stronger...

I kinda feel like I can beat opponents
I wouldn't stand a chance against before!

My wish was to heal my
childhood friend's injury.
Well, no, it wasn't just that...

What I really wanted was the power to
help all of the people precious to me.

So I don't have a single regret about
becoming a Magical Girl. I don't think
it would be right to regret it.

All right, let's face the day
with everything we got!

Each day is full of challenges,
but you won't fix 'em by sitting
around and worrying about them!
Morning!

My alarm clock didn't go off,
so I almost overslept,
but phew... I made it!

Whoohoo, lunch time!
C'mon, let's go go go!

What, you don't think it's
worth going crazy over?

Of course it is!
I'm a growing girl, aren't I!
I'm heading out soon.
Yep, on the lookout for sneaky Witches.

That's what it takes to be an ally of justice,
just like Mami said!
What, it's this late already?!

I finally finished my homework
and now I gotta hit the hay!
Ugh... I should have started earlier!

I don't think people take me for someone
who listens to classical music.

When I know the name of some
famous piece, everyone just flips out...
You're late!

We're all ready for some Witch patrolling!
No slacking off!
Time to get going!

I wished for powers to protect
the people I love.

If someone shows up that's worse
than a Witch, I'll fight them.
Even if it's a Magical Girl.
Madoka's mom is reeeally cool.
She's gorgeous AND has an awesome job.
How do ya turn into someone like that?

My friend Hitomi is busy every day
taking piano lessons, Japanese dance,
stuff like that.
So glad I'm just a middle-class kid...

I only started checking out
CD shops 'cause of my friend.

For some reason I've gotten real
good at spotting super rare stuff!

The thing that shocked me most
about becoming a Magical Girl
was being able to use telepathy!

I have no idea how it works,
but it's super handy!

Oh, Madoka...
Putting her hair up in ribbons,
getting attention from all the boys!
I won't have it! Madoka is MINE, ya hear?
That transfer student, Homura Akemi...

She's got glasses, braids,
AND can't stop tripping over thin air.

Is she TRYING to be a fan favorite?!
Is that it?!

We're so lucky to have a great senpai
like Mami at our school.
She never uses magic for her own gain!
She's the most upstanding Magical Girl.

You know Kyoko?
She always yelling, "It's too bitter!"
when she tries the tea Mami makes...
She's got taste buds of a little kid!

I used my one shot at a miracle for him...
I'm not gonna downplay the feelings
I had when I did it.

I don't regret my choice,
and I never will. No way.
I'm gonna punch your lights out!
Case closed, I guess!
Sheesh, that was cutting it close!
Is it okay to praise myself for that?

I almost dozed off from
sheer boredom there!
Sorry for the wait!

The Magical Girl of Justice,
Sayaka Miki has arrived!

Don't worry about anything!
You can count on me! I know, cliche, right?

Whoa! I'm brimming all over with
this cool magical feeling!
Mmgh, I haven't felt this good in forever!
Talk about refreshing!
Thanks for sticking with me all this time.
It really takes a load off my mind!

I've earned enough experience to stand
tall as a pretty decent Magical Girl, I think!
But I'm still the same old Sayaka.
Hope we can keep on working together!

I don't really have any
special potential or skills...
But hey, even I managed to get this tough!

Am I allowed to be proud of that?
I think so, right?
